page.title: 19Sights in Alstonefield
page.content:
{Good God} who's this coming down the road? {Is it an alien?} No, it's a {Hippi.} {God,} we get some tourists these days!
He was wearing a pair of shorts which showed his {fat, hairy} legs. He was {fat} and wobbling everywhere. His shoes didn't do any good for him, they had heels on them and they were pointed at the toes. (The heels weren't all that high though.) He looked as if he hadn't shaved for days. He had a {long moustache} which {curled} at the ends. He {wobbled} past the kitchen window, then he {wobbled out of sight.}
